feature.name: disable_create_org
feature.description: Turning this on will prevent users from creating any additional organisations

feature.name: saml
feature.description: Enables SAML auth

feature.name: clone_environment
feature.description: adds the ability to clone an environment

feature.name: demo_feature
feature.description: Shows a demo feature in the side navigation bar

feature.name: butter_bar
feature.description: Show html in a butter bar for certain users

feature.name: try_it
feature.description: Try it panels

feature.name: dark_mode
feature.description: Controlled via segments, determines if the user has dark mode on

feature.name: read_only_mode
feature.description: Determines if org needs to contact sales

feature.name: oauth_github
feature.description: GitHub login key

feature.name: integration_data
feature.description: Integration config for different providers

feature.name: integrations
feature.description: Defines the integrations we display

feature.name: payments_enabled
feature.description: Determines whether to show payment UI / seats

feature.name: plan_based_access
feature.description: Controls rbac and 2f based on plans

feature.name: usage_chart
feature.description: Display influx usage chart and number

feature.name: flag_analytics
feature.description: Surface analytics when viewing a flag

feature.name: oauth_google
feature.description: Google login key

feature.name: segment_operators
feature.description: Determines what rules are shown when creating a segment

feature.name: scaleup_audit
feature.description: Disables audit log for anyone under scaleup

feature.name: prevent_fetch
feature.description: Prevent the flagsmith frontend from fetching flags

feature.name: restrict_project_create_to_admin
feature.description: Adds option to edit organisation to restrict project creation to admins
